overview:
Pete is responsible for executing Relay’s product strategy, developing the market roadmap, and ensuring that the company’s short and long-term goals are aligned with client needs. Prior to Relay, Pete spent the 10+ years investing and analyzing technology and business service companies. In 2007, Pete formed Red Wolf Holdings, to invest and incubate web-based services.

Through Red Wolf, Peter started a consumer web service called QuestionSense.com and most recently co-founded Relay.

Previously, Peter worked at Spectrum Equity Investors in Boston, a $4 billion private equity firm focused on investing in financial technology, online media and information service companies. Before Spectrum, Peter worked in the Leveraged Finance Group of Citigroup, underwriting high yield bank and bond offerings. Prior to that, Peter served as an analyst at Graham Partners, a middle-market LBO firm based in suburban Philadelphia. Peter graduated from Villanova University, with a B.S. in Business Administration. While at Villanova, Peter played Division 1 lacrosse, started and managed an industrial cleaning company, and co-founded the Villanova Entrepreneurial Society.
